name: Rocky Road (joycentipede)
description:
Rocky Road is an endless game where you are a metal ball on a foreign planet. You have to avoid the rocks on your path that gets more challenging over time. 

You have to avoid the rocks and if you hit it, you shatter into pieces. Each hazard you pass through earns you a point on the scoreboard. 

Using the joystick, you can swerve left and right on the path. 

Updates from Moon Runner:

Improved Physics

Platform tilts as player moves 

More Difficult as player can fall off the edge

Menu Screen

High Scores Saved

Bug:

"Play" can't be toggled after respawn. Must quit and rejoin.
